heading: HB00186
0: AN ACT GIVING THE PERSONS AFFECTED BY TYPHOONS AND OTHER NATURAL DISASTERS IN AREAS DECLARED TO BE IN A STATE OF CALAMITY A MORATORIUM, FORBEARANCE OR GRACE PERIOD IN THE PAYMENT OF UTILITY BILLS
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00186
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GIVING THE PERSONS AFFECTED BY TYPHOONS AND OTHER NATURAL DISASTERS IN AREAS DECLARED TO BE IN A STATE OF CALAMITY A MORATORIUM, FORBEARANCE OR GRACE PERIOD IN THE PAYMENT OF UTILITY BILLS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-01-31
          -To be consolidated with other bills of similar subject matter
      2. Tabled by the Committee on 2017-05-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SOCIAL SERVICES ON 2016-07-26
